creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: wild scene in a green, yellow and orange circus ring; woman with long blonde hair holding a whip and flaming bar with a male acrobat jumping over it onto the back of a running blue horse; man standing on running brown horse at left, juggling swords; another man at back riding sideways on a grey horse; tightrope walkers, ULC; clown balancing a plate on top of pole on his nose at left; dancing bear behind clown

signed: Signed, dated LRC, in black: [Red Grooms \'90]
title: Leningrad Circus
